msg: Update to match changes in scope configuration in core.

author: skitching
msg: Make conversation lifetime a property of the scope, not a subclass.
Detect 2 beans with same conversation but different scopes.

author: varlax
msg: - common set of properties for setting tested hdk/jdk/jre and other resources;
- shared utilities & properties controlling test compilation, execution, test generation;
- unified layout for all test artifacts and results;
- support of single test execution (via -Dtest.case) for all suites;
